amendment.description: Amendment establishes a moratorium on using federal funds to purchase carbon offsets with the funding authorized in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-678 to establish a moratorium on using federal funds to purchase carbon offsets with the funding authorized in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ehlers amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 397 - 17 (Roll no. 375).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Ehlers.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ehlers amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 397 - 17 (Roll no. 375).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
